decision_conditions: Please be advised that this application permits the partial discharge of Condition 11 (Landscape Scheme) in respect of Phase 1 only, as attached to planning permission ref. 38421/APP/2021/4045 dated 25-11-2022.

It is emphasised that the Phase 1 temporary details hereby approved shall not be retained in perpetuity. A separate application is required to formally discharge Condition 11 (Landscape Scheme) in respect of Phase 2. Once the Phase 2 details are approved, that scheme should be implemented as soon as possible in place of the Phase 1 temporary scheme.
It should also be clarified that the Phase 2 'Day Final' details listed under this approval shall be used to inform the application to discharge Condition 11 (Landscape Scheme) in respect of Phase 2.
The Phase 1 temporary plans hereby approved are to be implemented on a temporary basis and not retained in perpetuity. The Phase 1 temporary plans are listed below for reference:-
DCS20109-NWA-DC-B1-LP-DR-A-10510 Rev. P02 Building 1 Phase 1 - Temporary
DCS20109-NWA-DC-B1-LP-DR-A-10511 Rev. P03 Building 1 Phase 1 Fencing Layout - Temporary
DCS20109-NWA-DC-B1-LP-DR-A-10514 Rev. P02 Temporary Scheme Entrance Elevations
DCS20109-BCA-DC-01-LP-DR-L-10200 Rev. P04 External General Arrangement Plan
DCS20109-BCA-DC-01-LP-DR-L-10213 Rev. P01 External General Arrangement Plan - With Attenuation
DCS20109-BCA-DC-01-LP-DR-L-10201 Rev. P02 Earthworks Plan - Phase 1
DCS20109-BCA-DC-01-LP-DR-L-10204 Rev. P01 Detailed Planting Plan - Phase 1
DCS20109-ARUP-DC-01-LP-DR-C-98270 Rev. C01 Road Pavements Building 1
The Phase 2 'Day Final' plans submitted under the current application are listed below:-
DCS20109-BCA-DC-01- LP-DR-L-10211 S4 Rev. 05 Amenity Plaza Concept Proposal
DCS20109-NWA-DC-B1-LP-DR-A-10512 Rev. P05 Building 1 Phasing - Day Final
DCS20109-NWA-DC-B1-LP-DR-A-10513 Rev. P05 Building 1 Fence Layout - Day Final
DCS20109-NWA-DC-B1-LP-DR-A-10515 Rev. P04 Day Final Scheme Entrance Elevations
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to the partial discharge of Condition 11 (Landscape Scheme - Phase 1/Eastern Building Only) as attached to planning permission ref. 38421/APP/2021/4045 dated 25-11-2022 (Redevelopment of the site to deliver data centre campus including: two data centre buildings (Use Class B8); associated energy and electricity infrastructure, buildings, and plant; security gatehouse, systems and enclosures; works to the highway, car parking and cycle parking; hard and soft landscaping; as well as associated infrastructure, ancillary office use, and associated external works).
